Description of incident: An employee is accused of stealing more than $170,000 from several customers.  The woman was indicted on 15 counts of theft by a bank employee and four counts of aggravated identity theft.  While employed at SunTrust between October 2006 and August 2008 the woman allegedly created a loan for someone without their knowledge and forged the person's signature in order to use $15,175 of their money for herself.  At least five other people were victimized in similar ways. Another customer had the money from their CD taken.
